item.title: Documentation
item.description: Vignettes ChIPseeker: an R package for ChIP peak Annotation, Comparison and Visualization Blog posts News and updates BioC 3.1: NEWS of my BioC packages BioC 3.2: NEWS of my BioC packages BioC 3.3: NEWS of my BioC packages BioC 3.4: NEWS of my BioC packages parsing BED coordinates ChIPseeker: an R/Bioconductor package for ChIP peak annotation, comparison and visualization Annotation ChIPseeker for ChIP peak annotation multiple annotation in ChIPseeker Visualization visualization methods in ChIPseeker upsetplot in ChIPseeker covplot supports GRangesList Functional Enrichment Analysis functional enrichment analysis with NGS data Comparison ChIPseq data mining with ChIPseeker Find out more on https://guangchuangyu.
